name: Pokkén Tournament DX
overview: Fight your way to the top in Pokkén Tournament for the Nintendo Switch. You enter the Ferrum League, winning battles to increase the number of Pokémon available to you, and you harness the power of the Synergy Stones to connect to your Pokémon. Test the strength of your partnership in Pokkén Tournament. - Fight as Decidueye, Darkrai , Scizor, Empoleon, Croagunk, and more - Execute powerful Pokémon moves with simple button combinations - Enjoy an intuitive fighting system for all skill levels - For one to two players
